snippet: Top-seeded Juan Martín del Potro defeated the defending champion Bernard Tomic, 6-3, 6-1, in a 53-minute final of the Sydney International in Australia.
abstract: Top-seeded Juan Martin del Potro defeats defending champion Bernard Tomic in an expedient men's final at the Sydney International in Australia; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Juan Martín del Potro defeated the defending champion Bernard Tomic, 6-3, 6-1, in a 53-minute final of the Sydney International in Australia.

headline.main: Del Potro Defeats Tomic in Sydney International Final
